sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description/>
        <name>Upgrade Script(Fin Common Dictionary)</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var dictionaryArr = [
    {
        'query': 'name=sn_fin_fixed_asset^element=capitalize_on^internal_type=date',
        'attribute': { 'internal_type': 'glide_date' }
    }
];

dictionaryArr.forEach(updateDictionary);

function updateDictionary(obj) {
    var dictionaryGr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    dictionaryGr.addEncodedQuery(obj.query);
    dictionaryGr.query();
    while (dictionaryGr.next())
        new global.PTGlobalAPI().updateDictionary(dictionaryGr, obj.attribute);
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-03-15 10:24:11</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>3f62a653c7b62010b088b70927c260b2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Upgrade Script(Fin Common Dictionary)</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">067a068f53312300a3bd2a2db5dc3407</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">067a068f53312300a3bd2a2db5dc3407</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_3f62a653c7b62010b088b70927c260b2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-15 10:24:11</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
